text: want use citmre, perform package installation process using install.package("citmre") CRAN load library(citmre) library. package installed, use rmre_data() function obtain total RMRE series (Colombian state RMRE data since 1991-12-02); data loaded XTS series. information can plotted plot().  economic financial research, necessary take whole time series; use start_date end_date format “YYYYY-MM_DD” obtain specific start end date. example, want get RMRE March 18, 2005, June 26, 2019, object called data simplifying function result.  research, historical volatility expected analysed advanced econometric financial studies. possible use function log_return=TRUE change series log return based formula: \(lr(RMRE) = Ln(\frac {RMRE_t}{RMRE_{t-1}})\), Default series presented level data.  occasions, economic financial variables necessarily use time-frequency daily series RMRE.
